markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Deft Cooperation](/Feats.aspx?ID=873) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 23 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Pathfinder Agent](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=13)

**Prerequisites**
[Pathfinder Agent Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=871)

</column>

---

When you set things up to help your allies, you also gain some of the fruits of your labors. When you successfully [Aid](/Actions.aspx?ID=75) an attack roll or AC, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to attack rolls or AC against that enemy until the end of your next turn, whichever you granted to your ally. When you successfully Aid a skill check, if you attempt the exact same skill check (not just using the same skill, but using it for the same purpose, for instance a check to Climb the same wall) on your next turn, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your skill check.
name: Deft Cooperation
search_markdown:
<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<additional-info>
<row gap="tiny">**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 23 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Pathfinder Agent Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=871)

</additional-info>

---

<summary>
You gain a bonus to your own checks when Aiding an ally.
</summary>
summary: You gain a bonus to your own checks when Aiding an ally.
summary_markdown: You gain a bonus to your own checks when Aiding an ally.
text: <title level="1" right="Feat 4" pfs="Standard" > Deft Cooperation Source World Guide pg. 23 2.0 Archetype Pathfinder Agent Prerequisites Pathfinder Agent Dedication --- When you set things up to help your allies, you also gain some of the fruits of your labors. When you successfully Aid an attack roll or AC, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to attack rolls or AC against that enemy until the end of your next turn, whichever you granted to your ally. When you successfully Aid a skill check, if you attempt the exact same skill check (not just using the same skill, but using it for the same purpose, for instance a check to Climb the same wall) on your next turn, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your skill check.
